mapper.insert: insert into reply( reply_no, reply_writer, reply_qna, reply_content )values( #{replyNo}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyQna}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: select * from reply where reply_qna = #{replyQna} order by reply_no asc
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{replyContent}, reply_utime = sysdate where reply_no = #{replyNo}
